name: Enjoy The Snow (Bitsy Snow Jam)
description:
Arrows to move.  Collect the snow before you fall to the ground.

This is a submission for the Bitsy Game Maker's Snow Jam.  I have been struggling with the ideas of making it in the industry of music for games and art installations and film scoring, but I've recently decided to only make decisions based on what makes me creatively happy, instead of what will benefit the future of my artistic career.  With impending death, I'd rather not look toward achieving a future.  Instead I'd like to focus on what I enjoy to create and what means something to me.

So, play as snow fall as I relate these concepts to the snow in Indiana, where I live and have grown up in.   Collect the other snowfall while falling to the ground to read bits of these musings.

My significant other helped me with the color palette for the game over our Christmas break, so this little game was a fun form of creative bonding with her.

Thanks for playing!  Enjoy The Snow!
